sentences.sContent: The file was altered to falsify the evidence.
sentences.sCn: 文件被动了手脚，以此伪造证据。

synos.tran: 伪造；篡改；歪曲；证明...虚假

remMethod.val: fals(假) + ify → 造假 → 篡改

words.tran: 伪造；歪曲；[审计] 篡改；证明是假
[法] 伪造者；伪证的人；撒谎的人

trans.tranOther: to change figures, records etc so that they contain false information
